features: Package Content: You will receive 30 Valentines day stationery sets, including 30 x pencils, 30 x notebooks, 30 x heart erasers, 30 x rulers, 30 x heart cards and 30 x gift bags. The perfect combination will be preferred by children.
Quality Material: The Valentine exchange gifts for classroom are made of premium material, high quality and no harm to our body. Providing great using experience.

Valentines' Theme: The Valentines day stationery kids gift set are designed with adorable love-heart patterns, and there is blank space on the cards for kids to leave their messages on. Attractive to young girls and boys.

Easy to Use: The valentines day gifts sets are learning stationery, with beautiful patterns, they encourage kids to be more interested in learning or writing for their friends and someone important to him or her.
Valentines Exchange Gift: Perfect for Children's valentines' gifts, classroom exchange gifts, classroom rewards, prize of class or school events, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the little gifts and cards great little assortment for class valentines. Great quality nice and colorful best of all makes it fun for many children’s and enough to make all the classmates feel special with a little gift. Great quality and value indeed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Was such a hit for the kids
reviews.reviewText: I knew my daughter would be having a valentine's day party so I was looking for goody bags that I could give out to the kids. I saw this it was a perfect idea. I would have given 5 stars but they had enough for 30 bags but it only came with 20 bags. So I had to go purchase more bags to cover the rest of the goody bags. I bought some candy as well to add into the bags. But they were a big hit the kids loved the pencils and notebooks. I really enjoyed making the goody bags it was the perfect valentine's day bag. If your a teacher this would be perfect to give out to the kids for valentine's day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This made valentines shopping so super easy for my kids classrooms! The products are great, well made and it was fun and easy to assemble! No need to stress anymore if you invest in this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a large class
reviews.reviewText: I have put gift bags like this together with items purchased separately before, and the price can really add up, so it's nice to get everything you need in one kit, enough for 30 classmates. The quality of the pencils, erasers, and bookmarks is very good. The notepads are stapled which made them feel a little cheaper than if they'd been bound with sewing or glue, but they're not bad. For a dollar a piece to make a complete gift, you can't do much better, and this is a good choice for classrooms where you have to be careful with allergies since so many candy options have nuts. Overall I would recommend for the class Valentine exchange or for a teacher who wants a cute gift for students.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is perfect the quality is worth the money for these

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for girls.
reviews.reviewText: These were the perfect thing for my grand daughter to hand out for the valentine exchange at school. She made sure to pick out each one for each kid and matched up the boy types for the boys and the girls ones for girls. It was a good project for her to work on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my 3rd grader
reviews.reviewText: I actually used this pack for my 3rd and 6th graders class. The pack came with sturdy bags, pencils, erasers, rulers, notebooks, and stickers. Everything in the pack was well made and the classes were were extremely happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter just used it for her valentine's party at school. These gifts were such a hit. Would recommend.I added two chocolate bars in the bag along with other school supplies though. Made the gifts even sweeter. LOL

The items themselves are decent, but the seller is omitting some of them. I should have checked the previous reviews mentioning the shortage of treat bags. I received only 24 when I needed 25, and I was supposed to get 30.
I order this product to prepare gifts for my son classmates 26 of them and receive just 20 bags to put items in, instead 30. Terrible feeling really disappointed.
